Is this right for you?

Book4Keeping caters for small to medium sized businesses in any of the industries below:

eCommerce & Online
businesses

Real Estate & Home
Maintenance

Transport & Warehousing

Transport & Warehousing

Transport & Warehousing

If your business doesn’t fall under any of the above categories, don’t worry! Book4Keeping might still be able to help!

Book4Keeping is owned and managed by a sole Senior Chartered Practice Accountant, taking on only a handful of clients for a more personalized and cost-effective service to a select few.

What can Book4Keeping do for you?

Saves you time

Set up automized processing of your recurring transactions so you spend less time working on tedious tasks

Saves you cost

Prepare your financial statements up to the tax lodgment stage which saves you additional tax agent costs

Give peace of mind

Rest peacefully knowing that the most fundamental component of your business is being taken care of accurately and timely

Keep you up to date

Your books will be balanced, tax payable and payroll liabilities will be sorted, and a professional will deal with the ATO for you

Give a business

Gain a clear view of your financial performance which can be reviewed to reveal opportunities for business improvement

Proficient with the leading
software

A service devoted to making your life more enjoyable by saving you time by using all the modern tools and software

Getting your business
started

If you’re thinking about building your own business but don’t know where to start, Book4Keeping can help with that too!

Book4Keeping can set you up with all the fundamentals needed to start, grow, and maintain a legitimate business:

  • ABN, ACN, TFN, GST & business name
  • Employee payroll and/or superannuation set up
  • Automate regular transaction processes
  • Organize a systematic approach for taxation processes
  • Facilitate communications directly with the tax agent & ATO for you
  • Aid in reviewing quarterly results and identifying lucrative opportunities or amendments
  • Appropriate software for compliance, reporting & management processes

Céline (Book4Keeping Director) is an exceptional accountant who always goes above and beyond for her clients, but the best part is that she does it with a smile. Not only will you and your business benefit from her services, you’ll also really enjoy working with her
